experience.name: experience
experience.values: 0=Less than 1 year|1=1-3 years|2=3-5 years|3=More than 5 years

next_step.name: next_step
next_step.values: 0=HR First Meeting|1=Technical Test|2=Meeting With Future Team Member|3=Meeting With CODIR Member|4=Notification Of Decision
